## Version 0.0.1

- Initial project setup

## Version 0.0.2

- Major feature implementation

## Version 0.0.3

- Updated `README.md` documentation

## Version 0.0.4

- Added guidance message for `ExejsRuntimeUnavailableError`

## Version 0.0.6

- Fixed `JScript` runtime issues
  
- Fixed `UnicodeDecodeError: 'gbk' codec can't decode` in subprocess
  
- Added `reset_runtime` and `find_all_runtime_name_list` functions

## Version 0.0.7

- Added `evaluate_async` and `execute_async` methods (#2)
  
- Added guidance message for `ExejsProgramError`
